name: Crepes with Lime Cream Filling
ingredients: 2/3 c. heavy whipping cream, ¼ tsp. vanilla
8 oz. softened cream cheese, zest of 1 lime
steps: ½ tsp.baking powder 2 Tbsp. butter, melted
In bowl combine flour, sugar, baking powder and salt, dry whisk to combine. Add all remaining crepe ingredients.
Beat at medium speed, scraping bowl, often. Spray Pam on skillet, make sure it is well heated. Pour about
¼ c. batter in middle of pan, rotate pan until a thin film covers the pan. Cook over medium head until very lightly
browned, loosen edges and turn and cook other side.
Blend cream cheese, sugar, zest and vanilla into a bowl. Whip cream separately and fold into cream
cheese mizture. Serve in crepes with fresh fruit ie. Strawberries, Kiwis, Bananas
